item.title: Botany Manor comes to PS5 and PS4 December 17th
item.content:encoded:
https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2024/11/12/botany-manor-comes-to-ps5-and-ps4-december-17th/

The botanical based puzzler Botany Manor is coming to PS5 and PS4, Whitehorn Games and Balloon Studios have confirmed, with the release date set for December 17th. Botany Manor launched in April for PC, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and Switch. PlayStation players will finally get the chance to explore the Manor and its surroundings, while solving the puzzles to bring rare plants to life.

Players will have the opportunity to uncover the secrets of Arabella, a pioneering 19th century female scientist, as they navigate the manorâ€™s rooms and spaces. By interacting with objects and solving plant-based puzzles, players will piece together the clues that will show the struggles Arabella faced as a scientist in the 19th century due to being a woman.

As stated before, Botany Manor is currently available on PC via Steam, Nintendo Switch, and Xbox One and Xbox Series S|X, and is part of the Xbox Game Pass library.

Source: Press Release
